cheatinterface_button_effect = {
    potential = { always = yes }
    allow = { always = yes }
}

cheatinterface_button_title = {
    potential = { always = no }
    allow = { always = no }
}

######################################################################################
#                               Resource Button Events                               #
######################################################################################

############################# Resource Minerals #################################
cheatinterface_button_resource_minerals = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.1001"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_resource_minerals_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t9
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t10
            }
        }
    }
}
cheatinterface_button_resource_minerals_t2 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t2_modifier

            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t2_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t2

        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t2
                days = -1

            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t6_modifier

                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t10_modifier

                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t8

                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_minerals_t8_modifier

                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_minerals_t3

#################################################################################

############################### Resource Energy #################################

cheatinterface_button_resource_energy = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.1002"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_resource_energy_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t9
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t10
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t2_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t2
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t2_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t2
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t2
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_energy_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t1
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t9
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_energy_t10
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_alloys_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_alloys_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_alloys_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_alloys_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_resource_alloys_t1

            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_alloys_t1_modifier

    allow = {
        is_ai = no

            id = "cheatinterface.1007"
        }
    }
}

    }

        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }

            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_exotic_gases_t1_modifier

            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_exotic_gases_t1_modifier

    }

############################### Resource Rare Crystals #################################

cheatinterface_button_resource_rare_crystals = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.1010"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_resource_rare_crystals_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_resource_rare_crystals_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_resource_rare_crystals_t9

        always = yes
    }

        is_ai = no
    }

            limit = {

        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.1013"
        }
    }
}

        }
    }

            id = "cheatinterface.1015"
        }
    }

        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }

    allow = {

            id = "cheatinterface.2003"
        }
    }

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_planetary_decision_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_empire_planetary_decision_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_planetary_decision_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_empire_planetary_decision_t1
        }
        else = {

                modifier = cheatinterface_empire_planetary_decision_t1
                days = -1

                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_planetary_decision_t1_modifier

        always = yes

    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }

        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.2004"
        }
    }

cheatinterface_button_empire_research_physics_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_research_physics_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_empire_research_physics_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_research_physics_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_empire_research_physics_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_empire_research_physics_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_research_physics_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_research_physics_t2_modifier

                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_research_physics_t5_modifier

                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_empire_research_physics_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_empire_research_physics_t4

        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {

            id = "cheatinterface.2006"
        }
    }
}

        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {

            id = "cheatinterface.2008"
        }
    }
}

        }
    }

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_trust_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_empire_trust_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_trust_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_empire_trust_t1

                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_trust_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_empire_trust_t2_modifier

    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no

    effect = {

            id = "cheatinterface.2013"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_ship_base_speed = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3001"
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_base_ship_speed_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_base_speed_t1

            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_base_ship_speed_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_base_speed_t1

                days = -1

                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_base_ship_speed_t1_modifier

cheatinterface_button_ship_ftl_speed = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3002"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_ship_ftl_speed_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_ftl_ship_speed_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_ftl_speed_t1

            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_ftl_ship_speed_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_ftl_speed_t1

################################################################################

###################### Ship Armor Regeneration Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_ship_armor_regeneration = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3003"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_ship_armor_regeneration_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t9
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t10
            }
        }

                modifier = cheatinterface_ship_armor_regeneration_t9
                days = -1

            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t4_modifier

                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t6_modifier

                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_armor_regeneration_t8_modifier

###################### Ship Hull Regeneration Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_ship_hull_regeneration = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3004"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_ship_hull_regeneration_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_hull_regeneration_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t9
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_hull_regeneration_t10
            }
        }

###################### Ship Build Speed Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_ship_build_speed = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3006"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_ship_build_speed_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_build_speed_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t9
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_build_speed_t10
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3007"
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no

    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {

################################################################################

###################### Ship Fleet Limit Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_ship_fleet_limit = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3008"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_ship_fleet_limit_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_fleet_limit_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t9
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_fleet_limit_t10
            }
        }
    }
}

###################### Ship Health Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_ship_health = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3009"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_ship_health_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t9_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_health_t10_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t9
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_health_t10
            }
        }
    }
}

###################### Ship Weapon Damage Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_ship_weapon_damage = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.3011"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_ship_weapon_damage_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_weapon_damage_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_weapon_damage_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_weapon_damage_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_ship_weapon_damage_t1

                modifier = cheatinterface_ship_weapon_damage_t1
                days = -1

            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_weapon_damage_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_weapon_damage_t2_modifier

                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_weapon_damage_t5_modifier

###################### Army Build Speed Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_army_build_speed = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.4001"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_army_build_speed_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_build_speed_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_army_build_speed_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_build_speed_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_army_build_speed_t1

                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_army_build_speed_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_army_build_speed_t4

###################### Army Attack Damage Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_army_attack_damage = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.4002"
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }

        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_damage_t1_modifier

cheatinterface_button_army_attack_health = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.4003"
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }

        if = {
            limit = {

        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_army_attack_health_t10
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t10_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_attack_health_t9_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_army_attack_health_t1
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_army_attack_health_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_army_attack_health_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_army_attack_health_t4

    }

        is_ai = no

###################### Army Collateral Damage Button Effects ###########################

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.4005"
        }
    }

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_collateral_damage_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_army_collateral_damage_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_collateral_damage_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_army_collateral_damage_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_army_collateral_damage_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_collateral_damage_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_collateral_damage_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_army_collateral_damage_t3_modifier

cheatinterface_button_army_defence_damage = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.4006"
        }
    }
}

        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no

        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.4007"
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no

    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.4009"
        }
    }
}

        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.5001"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_buildings_starbase_capacity = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.5002"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_buildings_starbase_capacity_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_starbase_capacity_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_starbase_capacity_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_starbase_capacity_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_starbase_capacity_t1

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {

                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t10_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t10
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t10_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t10
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t10
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t10_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t9_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t1
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t3

                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t5

                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_outpost_build_speed_t9

        always = yes

    allow = {

            id = "cheatinterface.5005"
        }
    }

            id = "cheatinterface.5006"
        }
    }

cheatinterface_button_buildings_megastructure_upkeep_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_megastructure_upkeep_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_megastructure_upkeep_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_megastructure_upkeep_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_megastructure_upkeep_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_megastructure_upkeep_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_megastructure_upkeep_t1_modifier

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }

        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.5008"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_buildings_megastructure_build_cost_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_megastructure_build_cost_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_megastructure_build_cost_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_buildings_megastructure_build_cost_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_megastructure_build_cost_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_buildings_megastructure_build_cost_t1
                days = -1
            }

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }

            id = "cheatinterface.5010"
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.6001"
        }
    }
}

        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_habitability_t6_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_population_habitability_t6
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_habitability_t6_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_population_habitability_t6
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_population_habitability_t6
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_habitability_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_habitability_t1_modifier

                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_habitability_t3_modifier

###################### Population Bio Growth Speed Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_population_stability = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.6004"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_population_stability_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_stability_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_population_stability_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_stability_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_population_stability_t1

        else = {

            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_stability_t1_modifier

cheatinterface_button_population_happiness = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.6005"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_population_happiness_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_happiness_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_population_happiness_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_happiness_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_population_happiness_t1

        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_population_happiness_t1

                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_happiness_t1_modifier

    potential = {
        always = yes

    }

            id = "cheatinterface.6006"
        }

    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_amenities_usage_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_population_amenities_usage_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_population_amenities_usage_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_population_amenities_usage_t1
        }
        else = {

###################### Leader Lifespan Button Effects ###########################
cheatinterface_button_leader_lifespan = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        country_event = {
            id = "cheatinterface.7001"
        }
    }
}

cheatinterface_button_leader_lifespan_t1 = {
    potential = {
        always = yes
    }
    allow = {
        is_ai = no
    }
    effect = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_lifespan_t1_modifier
                has_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_lifespan_t1
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_lifespan_t1_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_lifespan_t1
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_leader_lifespan_t1
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_lifespan_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_lifespan_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_lifespan_t3_modifier

                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_lifespan_t4

    allow = {
        is_ai = no

            id = "cheatinterface.7003"
        }
    }
}

                has_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t10
            }
            remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t10_modifier
            remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t10
        }
        else = {
            add_modifier = {
                modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t10
                days = -1
            }
            hidden_effect = {
                set_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t10_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t1_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t2_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t3_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t4_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t5_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t6_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t7_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t8_modifier
                remove_country_flag = cheatinterface_has_leader_exp_gain_t9_modifier
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t1
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t2
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t3
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t4
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t5
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t6
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t7
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t8
                remove_modifier = cheatinterface_leader_exp_gain_t9
            }
        }
    }
}
